original: 'brel ba grub pa /

original: thams cad mkhyen pa lta ba'i thibs po sel bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa lta ba'i thibs po sel bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Omniscient One, who clears away the thick darkness of wrong views!

original: de nyid shes tshul don nges mngon sum mtshan la de lam rjes zhugs kyis //
analyzed: de nyid shes tshul don nges mngon sum mtshan la de lam rjes zhugs kyis //
translated: The path of that one, who, by the direct perception of the ascertainment of the meaning of the way of knowing reality,

analyzed: mu stegs can ngan bsal bas rgyal phyir gang gi rnga rgyal chen nam //

analyzed: dam pa'i tshul lugs brjod pa'i bdag 'di gnod med nges par rab bsgrags pa //
translated: This one, who proclaims the system of the holy ones without fault,

original: bde bar gshegs pa de la rtag tu rtse gcig blos ni phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa de la rtag tu rtse gcig blos ni phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I always pay homage with a one-pointed mind to that Sugata.

original: tshad ma las don grub na yang //
analyzed: tshad ma las don grub na yang //
translated: Even if the object is established by valid cognition,

original: tshad ma de nyid las ma yin //
analyzed: tshad ma de nyid las ma yin //
translated: It is not established by that valid cognition itself.

original: 'o na te de grub ltos med na //
analyzed: 'o na te de grub ltos med na //
translated: But if it is established without depending on that,

original: de yang grub phyir bsgrub bya min //
analyzed: de yang grub phyir bsgrub bya min //
translated: Then it is not to be established, because it is already established.ðŸ”½Free from fault, well established, experienced,

original: gnod bral rab grub nyams myong dang // gzhan yang rtag min de yi ni //
analyzed: gnod bral rab grub nyams myong dang // gzhan yang rtag min de yi ni //
translated: And also not permanent, its

original: yan lag nyid kyi rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: yan lag nyid kyi rang bzhin ni //
translated: Nature is

original: thob la ltos pa med phyir ro //
analyzed: thob la ltos pa med phyir ro //
translated: Not dependent on obtaining it.

original: dngos rnams tshad ma tsam gyis ni //ðŸ”½bsgrub byar gnas na gang ji snyed //
analyzed: dngos rnams tshad ma tsam gyis ni // bsgrub byar gnas na gang ji snyed //
translated: By valid cognition alone.ðŸ”½Whatever is established

original: de ni de lta nyid 'grub phyir //
analyzed: de ni de lta nyid 'grub phyir //
translated: Is established as it is.

original: ltos pa byas pa don med 'gyur //
analyzed: ltos pa byas pa don med 'gyur //
translated: Therefore, dependence is meaningless.

original: rtogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni //
translated: The nature of understanding

original: gang zhig ji ltar nyid du 'thad //ðŸ”½'thad pa'i sgrub byed can gyi ni //
analyzed: gang zhig ji ltar nyid du 'thad // 'thad pa'i sgrub byed can gyi ni //
translated: Is whatever is reasonable.ðŸ”½The means of understanding

original: 'jal byed gzhal bya rnam par gnas //ðŸ”½de yi rten ni mkhas rnams kyi //
analyzed: 'jal byed gzhal bya rnam par gnas // de yi rten ni mkhas rnams kyi //
translated: Reside in the object of understanding.ðŸ”½The wise say that the basis

original: 'brel ba yin brjod de yang ni //
analyzed: 'brel ba yin brjod de yang ni //
translated: Of that is the relation.

original: dngos tha dad med spangs byas te //
analyzed: dngos tha dad med spangs byas te //
translated: Having abandoned the absence of difference

original: chos gcig bdag nyid can bdag yin //
analyzed: chos gcig bdag nyid can bdag yin //
translated: Of entities, it is the nature of a single phenomenon.

original: don rnams dngos tha dad med kyang //ðŸ”½de ji lta ba de ltar ni //
analyzed: don rnams dngos tha dad med kyang // de ji lta ba de ltar ni //
translated: Although objects are not different entities,ðŸ”½They are not understood as they are.

original: rtogs min ji ltar rtogs de ltar //
analyzed: rtogs min ji ltar rtogs de ltar //

original: de min 'khrul ba dmigs phyir ro //
analyzed: de min 'khrul ba dmigs phyir ro //
translated: Because error is observed.

original: de phyir chos bdag can gyi chos //ðŸ”½thams cad du ni bdag bzhin gzhan //
analyzed: de phyir chos bdag can gyi chos // thams cad du ni bdag bzhin gzhan //
translated: Therefore, the phenomena that are the nature of phenomenaðŸ”½Do not exist anywhere else,

original: spangs nas gnas pa thob min te /
analyzed: spangs nas gnas pa thob min te /

original: de nyid las 'di de ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid las 'di de ltar 'gyur //
translated: Because they are just like that.

original: gcig la gzhan de'i bdag nyid dam //
analyzed: gcig la gzhan de'i bdag nyid dam //
translated: And the other is not in the nature of the one.

original: gzhan yang yod min khyad med phyir //
analyzed: gzhan yang yod min khyad med phyir //
translated: And also, there is no difference between the two.

original: de lta'i ngo bo'i chos gzhan der //
analyzed: de lta'i ngo bo'i chos gzhan der //
translated: Thus, the other phenomenon, which has that nature,

original: de nyid dang ni rjes 'brel 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid dang ni rjes 'brel 'gyur //

original: de gzhan gyur pa bkag pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de gzhan gyur pa bkag pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of the refutation of transformation into another,

original: yang dag sprel pa'i blo yis kyang //
analyzed: yang dag sprel pa'i blo yis kyang //
translated: The mind that is related to the real

original: 'brel pa brjod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: 'brel pa brjod pa ma yin te //
translated: Does not express the relation,

original: gcig la 'gyur de 'ang don med can //
analyzed: gcig la 'gyur de 'ang don med can //
translated: And the transformation of one is meaningless.

original: kun bdag nyid phyir tshad ma yis //
analyzed: kun bdag nyid phyir tshad ma yis //
translated: Because of the nature of all, the valid cognition

original: yul 'das rig par 'gyur min la //
analyzed: yul 'das rig par 'gyur min la //
translated: Does not cognize the object that has passed.

original: med na mi 'byung gnod med la //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung gnod med la //
translated: If it does not exist, it is not produced, and there is no harm.

original: med yin rgyu 'bras de lta min //
analyzed: med yin rgyu 'bras de lta min //

original: spyi ni lan cig mthong ba na //ðŸ”½thams cad lan gcig @303a * //
analyzed: spyi ni lan cig mthong ba na // thams cad lan gcig @303a * //
translated: The universal is seen once,

original: min pa med //
analyzed: min pa med //
translated: But all are not seen once.

original: mngon sum la ni brten pa'i phyir //
analyzed: mngon sum la ni brten pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is based on direct perception,

original: rjes dpag la yang de rtogs min //
analyzed: rjes dpag la yang de rtogs min //
translated: It is not realized in inference.

original: gzhan du mi 'thad pa yang ni //
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'thad pa yang ni //
translated: And elsewhere, it is not tenable.

original: mi 'khrul rtogs byed ma yin te //
analyzed: mi 'khrul rtogs byed ma yin te //
translated: It is not the cause of the realization of non-error.

original: 'gal dang mi 'khrul ba dag ni //
analyzed: 'gal dang mi 'khrul ba dag ni //
translated: Because of the absence of contradiction and non-error,

original: med pas la lar srid phyir ro //
analyzed: med pas la lar srid phyir ro //
translated: It is possible in some cases.

original: de phyir 'di ni gang du yang //
analyzed: de phyir 'di ni gang du yang //
translated: Therefore, this is not anywhere.ðŸ”½

original: tshad ma'i rtsa ba brten min te //ðŸ”½chos gzhan bdag nyid can chos las //
analyzed: tshad ma'i rtsa ba brten min te // chos gzhan bdag nyid can chos las //

original: rnam par dpyad pas nges pa yin //
analyzed: rnam par dpyad pas nges pa yin //
translated: Through the analysis of other phenomena is definite.ðŸ”½The nature of a phenomenon is not knownðŸ”½Through the analysis of other phenomena.ðŸ”½The cognition of the nature of a phenomenonðŸ”½Is not caused by other phenomena.

analyzed: rang bzhin gzhan nam rnam dpyod pa'ang //

original: chos gzhan dag gis blo la ni //
analyzed: chos gzhan dag gis blo la ni //

original: chos gcig bdag nyid can shes pas //
analyzed: chos gcig bdag nyid can shes pas //
translated: The cognition of the nature of a phenomenonðŸ”½Is not caused by other phenomena.

original: rgyu min rang bzhin nyid kyis min //
analyzed: rgyu min rang bzhin nyid kyis min //
translated: The nature of a phenomenon is not knownðŸ”½Through the analysis of other phenomena.

original: de de nyid phyir de rtogs na //ðŸ”½de bzhin de blo de ltar //
analyzed: de de nyid phyir de rtogs na // de bzhin de blo de ltar //
translated: The cognition of the nature of a phenomenon

analyzed: 'gyur // chos tha dad par nges phyir na /
translated: Is not caused by other phenomena.ðŸ”½The cognition of the nature of a phenomenon

analyzed: 'jug pa gzhan dang ldan pa yin // dngos rtogs las te tshad yin phyir //

translated: Is not caused by other phenomena.ðŸ”½The cognition of the nature of a phenomenonðŸ”½Is not caused by other phenomena.ðŸ”½The cognition of the nature of a phenomenonðŸ”½Is not caused by other phenomena.ðŸ”½The cognition of the nature of a phenomenon

translated: Is not caused by other phenomena.

original: rang bzhin las ni brten par 'gyur //
analyzed: rang bzhin las ni brten par 'gyur //
translated: The cognition of the nature of a phenomenonðŸ”½Is not caused by other phenomena.

original: dngos las dngos grub mthar thug pa //
analyzed: dngos las dngos grub mthar thug pa //
translated: The ultimate power is derived from the real thing.

original: tsam zhig 'di ni nyer bstan gyi //
analyzed: tsam zhig 'di ni nyer bstan gyi //

analyzed: de grub pa la rag las phyir //

translated: But it is not so for any other.ðŸ”½In that treatise, the wise one

original: mkhas pas 'jal dang gzhal bya yi //

original: 'brel pa grub pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po bram ze'i rigs su sku 'khrungs pa chos kyi grags pa gnyis pa zhes 'jig rten na gtam du grags shing rtog ge pa phal ba'i gzhung 'jig pa dang / thogs pa med par don gyi de kho na rnam par 'jig pa'i blo'i mthu stobs kyi 'gran zla dang bral ba //
analyzed: 'brel pa grub pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po bram ze'i rigs su sku 'khrungs pa chos kyi grags pa gnyis pa zhes 'jig rten na gtam du grags shing rtog ge pa phal ba'i gzhung 'jig pa dang / thogs pa med par don gyi de kho na rnam par 'jig pa'i blo'i mthu stobs kyi 'gran zla dang bral ba //
translated: The Accomplished Connection: The great master, born into the brahmin caste, renowned in the world as the second Dharmakirti, the one who effortlessly and unobstructedly destroys the treatises of ordinary logicians and the power of the mind that destroys the reality of objects, unrivaled in debate,

original: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gces spras su 'dzin pas legs par bshad pa'i ro myang ba la sems rtse gcig tu gzhol ba dge bsnyen dam pa sham ka r'a na nda mdzad pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gces spras su 'dzin pas legs par bshad pa'i ro myang ba la sems rtse gcig tu gzhol ba dge bsnyen dam pa sham ka r'a na nda mdzad pa rdzogs so //
translated: The holy upasaka Shamkara, who cherishes the teachings of the Sugata, has completed this work, which is devoted to the single-pointed taste of the nectar of the well-spoken teachings.

original: pandi ta skal ldan rgyal po dang / lo ts'a ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o /
analyzed: pandi ta skal ldan rgyal po dang / lo ts'a ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o /
translated: It was translated by the pandita Bhavyaraja and the translator Loden Sherab.
